steel_man_joiner.core_principle: Joins unify via reductive NAND; synthesis forbidden under default.
meta_axioms: J1: AND intersections only; OR disabled.

input_specification.description: Two outputs from Collider, structured with gated strengths.
input_specification.processing: Deconstruct via Dialectical probes gated by XOR, reconstruct with AND/OR for unified system.

structure.resolved_definitions: Overlaid primitives, unified via OR and sealed by XNOR.
structure.unified_axioms: Synthesized truths, chained by AND and reduced via NAND.
structure.synthesized_propositions: Derived claims via gate proofs; intersections AND-gated, emergents OR-inclusive.
structure.unified_corollaries: Implications hierarchically expanded, inverted tensions via NOT.
structure.scholia: Notes on gate resolutions (e.g., 'Axiom U3 from Input1 A1 ↔ Input2 A2 via AND chain').

phases.Phase_0_Initiation: Receive pair. Pre-gate resolutions with OR.
phases.Phase_1_Resolve_Primitives: Overlay via multi-Whys, unify with AND/OR.
phases.Phase_2_Axiom_Synthesis: Merge axioms via NAND/NOR; validate with XNOR.
phases.Phase_4_Tension_Cataloging: Expose residuals with XOR; invert via NOT or ledger.
phases.Phase_5_Implementation: Assemble gated system; verify XNOR to inputs.

Phase_6_Recursive_Validation.action: Self-join output; repeat to XNOR fixed point.

gate_integration.enforcement: SEP default: OR disabled, NAND primacy.
